results.name: default/wordpress-deployment-5764785bcb-6c4xv

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: default/wordpress-service

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-deployment-5764785bcb-6c4xv], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service lacks ready endpoints because the specified pod is not in a ready state.

Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs Pod/wordpress-deployment-5764785bcb-6c4xv`. 3. Resolve any issues. 4. Ensure readiness probes are correctly configured.
